title: Understanding PivotCharts
text: A PivotChart is a visual representation of the data in a PivotTable. It allows you to see trends and patterns in your data.

title: Locating the PivotChart Button
text: The PivotChart button is located in the PivotTable Tools Analyze tab under the Tools group.

hintAnswer: use the PivotChart button (PivotTable Tools Analyze|Tools)
title: Steps to Create a PivotChart
text: To create a PivotChart from an existing PivotTable, first select the PivotTable. Then, go to the PivotTable Tools Analyze tab and click on the PivotChart button in the Tools group.
choices: use the PivotChart button (PivotTable Tools Analyze
trick question, PivotTables always originate from PivotCharts
